titles.title: On The Lamb Our Souls Are Resting

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Conscience now no more condemns us, For His own most precious blood Once for all has washed and cleansed us, Cleansed us in the eyes of God.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Filled with this sweet peace for ever, On we go, through strife and care, Till we find that peace around us In the Lamb's high glory there.{/lang-eng}
